title: Collaborative Learning-Based Language Proficiency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and fundamental job-related knowledge
context.additional_context: For intermediate-level learners composed of current professionals, a course that enhances language application skills through collaborative learning strategies such as role-playing, group projects, and peer assessment.

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively explain complex linguistic concepts with peers through a 4-person group project.
Learners can demonstrate effective language use in real-world job situations through role-play activities.
Learners can provide structured feedback on others' language performance using peer assessment rubrics.
Learners can perform real-time resource sharing using digital devices (tablets/laptops) during collaborative processes.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
